12.content: Ok how small dose Larxene shrink you?
12.title: How Small

choices: She grab you and bring you at her place
121.content:
You were heading home after a hard day of work when, lost in your thoughts you hit a beautiful yet evil looking blond girl . She was dressed in her dark suit that looked kind of scary.

You apologized and helped her to go back to her feet , as you grabbed her hand a weird white flash came out from it and dirrectly strike you .
" oh , I'll make sure you'll be sorry ... Insect "

Hearing that you don't understand and take a few steps back . Looking at her standing back up then coming next to you.
She stepped toward you until she was right in front and she was standing , taller than you , about a head higher . And still growing you shook your head , beginning to panic as she suddenly push you with an overwhelming strength that made you collapse a few feet away .

As you were on the ground you witness horrified her body expansion as she finally finish to look like a giant , you were 6 inches tall.

"I think we will start the fun with you at this size "
121.title: 6 inches....

choices: You make it to the end of the boot
Your Too Slow! You get covered
1211.content:
You were in complete and paralyzing fear. You just bumped into this woman and she shrinks you in retaliation. And the face that she was giving showed that she has every intention of taking advantage of the situation. "Oh This Is Gonna Be Fun" the blonde said as she reached down for you. You tell your body to move but your mind knows better. That running wouldn't accomplish anything. Her fingers wrap around you and you felt vertigo as you were brought into the air and up. However you didn't go far enough as she stopped you not that far from the ground. You wonder why, until she took her black socked foot from her black boot and you pieced it together. "No, No, No" you mutter over and over again and try to struggle out of the Blondes grasp. However all you succeeded in was making her laugh at your pathetic struggles.

You are brought over her boot and you could see where you were heading. It looked like a black abyss. You look up and see the blondes face once again. And then with a sly smile she let you go and you fell right into the boot. You hit with a thud as you landed on the pure black sole. You look up to see the woman's face watching you with a smile "By The Way My Name Is Larxene" the blonde said finally introducing herself "But You Can Just Call Me Goddess". You were too stunned in fear to come back up with a retort "Now get comfortable, your gonna be in there for quite a while"

Before you can argue back her face disappears and is replaced by her sock covered foot. You panic as it enters the opening. You need to run towards the end of the boot so you aren't completely killed underneath her foot.

What Happens Next?
1211.title: Larxene's Boot

1253.content: Ok so how small dose she make you?
1253.title: Even Smaller....

info.brief_description: Larxene from the Kingdom Hearts games grows into a giantess or shrinks you down
info.description:
Larxene from Kingdom Hearts is sick of not getting much chances to be a giantess so she decides to do something about it.


Rules
1. Only Larxene can grow and only you can shrink

2. If Larxene grows she can't be under 50 feet and she can't be over 5000 feet

3. Try to stay away from feet but I won't stop you if you put feet in

4. This is mostly a sexual based story so be as sexual as you want

5. If you shrink you can't be any bigger then 6 inches and you can't be any smaller then 1/4 of an inch

6. Have fun and please add
